item.title: Lagrangians with PyTorch Part #1
item.description: Note: This series of posts is closely related to and inspired by this paper from Miles Cranmer, Sam Greydanus, Stephan Hoyer and others. To accompany the paper they also wrote a brilliant blog post about the work which I would encourage you to read. I really enjoy Lagrangian mechanics, in fact, I would go so far as to say that studying it was one of the best parts of my physics degree.

item.title: 3 Nice Garage Records
item.description: No particular order, just three Garage records I think are great. Enjoy! 1. Pied Piper & Unknown MC - Listen 2. Digga - Da Lick 3. Butter - Do Me Right
